abstract: Bank of America’s chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan, said that his bank must become less volatile in its operations and that it was continuing to streamline its myriad businesses worldwide.
snippet: Bank of America’s chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan, said that his bank must become less volatile in its operations and that it was continuing to streamline its myriad businesses worldwide.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America‘s chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan, said Tuesday that his bank must become less volatile in its operations and that it was continuing to streamline its myriad businesses worldwide, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Moynihan Outlines Bank of America Strategy
